radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT scan of the abdomen and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Diffusely heterogenous liver parenchymal enhancement without ductal dilatation, duodenitis, and diffuse colonic thickening concerning pancolitis.
Centrilobular ground glass opacities bilaterally with mild pulmonary edema.
Abnormal enhancement and thickening of the pituitary infundibulum and stalk.
Multifocal nodular hepatic steatosis and hepatomegaly without any focal liver abnormality; multiple indeterminate bony lesions read as non-specific focal sclerosis and cystic lesions.
